data.name: YouTube - Project 2012 (Legacy)
data.description:
NOTICE!!!: This greasemonkey extension works sort of (if you refresh the page) but since it's so inconsistent i won't be using this. RIP- https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/39405-youtube-classic-for-2018-polymer-disable
This is a project just for fun :) solo because i'm using this to learn code

Tries to imitate YouTube in 2012. ***credits to naadir500 for inspiration, and their licensing to use their code***

This is best to be used with:
https://userstyles.org/styles/147374/youtube-old-colors
https://userstyles.org/styles/162809/youtube-s-2011-2012-html-5-player

data.name: Brick Hill Trade: Dark Theme
data.description:
Do your eyes hurt at night when your browsing on Brick Hill Trade? this should solve the problem!

Created by Rottweiler


Join our Discord Server for new Themes, Updates, and more:
https://discord.me/-CELESTIAL



Tags: brickhill, brick hill, brick-hill, brickhilltrade, brick-hill.trade, brick hill trade, brick-hill trade, brick hill.trade, googie, rottweiler, celestial

data.name: Stylus Insomniac
data.description: A dark gray theme for Stylus. Stylish is not supported. Intended for use with the default CodeMirror theme. There are advanced options for a compact layout with 2, 3 or 4 columns. The compact layout works with the new default UI, so the classic UI will remain the same if selected.

data.name: Unity Documentation Night Mode
data.description:
Learn the Unity engine without going blind. This is basically a full conversion of what the documentation site would look like if it had a night mode.

Based on SmorcIRL's style
